Class InventoryDB

java.lang.Object
InventoryDB
public class InventoryDB extends Object
Class for generating and sending SQL queries to the database.

  • Method Details

    • searchInventory

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Inventory> searchInventory(String product_name) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Searches the database for a product in the inventory table.
      Parameters:
      product_name - Name of the product.
      Returns:
      A list of the products similar to the product name.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • searchInventories

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Inventory> searchInventories() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Searches the database for a all products in the inventory table.
      Returns:
      A list of all the products in the inventory.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • insertProduct

      public static void insertProduct(String product_name, String supplier, String cost, String quantity, String restock_quantity) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Inserts a new product into the inventory database.
      Parameters:
      product_name - Name of the product.
      supplier - Supplier for the product.
      cost - Cost of the product
      quantity - Quantity of the product.
      restock_quantity - Restock amount to set the quantity to.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

      menu_name - Name of the menu item.
      extra_cost - Extra cost of a menu item.
      type - Type of the menu item.

      Parameters:
      menu_name - Name of the menu item.
      product_name - Name of the product.
      quantity_needed - Amount of product to be used in the menu item.

    • findProduct

      public static Inventory findProduct(int product_ID) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Gets a product by product_ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      product_ID - ID of the product.
      Returns:
      An inventory object matching the product_ID.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the database driver class is not found.
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
